hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Building the future of web development

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: We started with a simple idea: web development should be fast, simple, and enjoyable. Too many teams were spending time on infrastructure instead of building great products.
Our platform was born from years of experience building and scaling web applications. We've taken everything we learned and packaged it into a developer-friendly platform.
Today, thousands of developers and companies use our platform to build faster, deploy easier, and scale without limits.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.statement: To empower developers to build amazing products without infrastructure complexity.

values.title: Developer First
values.description: Everything we build starts with the developer experience. Clean APIs, great docs, and tools that just work.

values.title: Performance Obsessed
values.description: We're never satisfied with 'fast enough'. Every millisecond matters to us and to your users.

values.title: Radically Simple
values.description: Complex problems deserve simple solutions. We hide the complexity so you can focus on what matters.

values.title: Open & Transparent
values.description: We believe in open source, transparent pricing, and honest communication with our community.
